eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.pivoting

Class MetricReferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.pivoting.MetricReferences

  • public class MetricReferences
extends Object
    Representation of distance metrics and number of reference (pivot) values per attribute.
